groupdesc: Parameters for theme features are configured here.

fields.name: widget_rules_state
fields.label: Widget rules
fields.tooltip: Enable widget rules used to disable specific widgets on selected pages or for specific groups of users.

fields.name: featured_video
fields.label: Featured Video
fields.tooltip: Enable featured video metabox on pages and posts.

fields.name: styleswitcher_state
fields.label: Style Switcher Display
fields.tooltip: Enable display of the styleswitcher in the theme.

fields.name: login_link
fields.label: Display login link
fields.tooltip: Enable display of the login link in the theme.

fields.name: login_url
fields.label: Login URL
fields.tooltip: Specify the URL used in the login link

fields.name: template_footer_top_button
fields.label: Display Back to top button
fields.tooltip: Enable display of Back to top button in the footer of the theme.

fields.name: ga_ua_type
fields.label: Google Analytics type
fields.tooltip: Please select old Google Analytics or new Universal Analytics

fields.name: ga_ua_id
fields.label: Google Analytics tracking ID
fields.tooltip: Please specify the UA ID i.e. UA-XXXXXX-Y

fields.name: thickbox_state
fields.label: Use Thickbox
fields.tooltip: Enable use of Thickbox to display post images in the popup.

fields.name: comments_autoblank
fields.label: Add target blank to comments links
fields.tooltip: If this option is enabled then every link in the comments text will contain attribute target='_blank'.

fields.name: comments_autolinking
fields.label: Autolinking in comments
fields.tooltip: If this option is enabled then every link in the comments text will be automatically changed into hyperlink.

fields.name: opensearch_explained
fields.label: Open Search is an open protocol used to easily integrate your page search with the browser search engines.

fields.name: opensearch_use_opensearch
fields.label: Enable support for Open Search
fields.tooltip: Enable support for Open Search, which activates an implementation of custom search engines based upon your blog search engines.

fields.name: opengraph_explained
fields.label: Open Graph is an open protocol used for better control over content displayed in Facebook.

fields.name: opengraph_use_opengraph
fields.label: Enable support for Open Graph
fields.tooltip: Enable support for Open Graph, exposing additional options to make your content more readable to Facebook crawlers.

fields.name: show_related
fields.label: Show Related articles
fields.tooltip: Enable block with realted articles underneath tags.

fields.name: show_author_posts
fields.label: Show Latest articles from this author
fields.tooltip: Enable block with articles of the same author.

fields.name: category_grid
fields.label: Enable category grid
fields.tooltip: Enable grid layout for categories.

fields.name: leading_row_column
fields.label: Rows/Columns of leading articles
fields.tooltip: Number of rows(type from 1 to 8) and columns(type from 1 to 4) for leading articles.

fields.name: primary_row_column
fields.label: Rows/Columns of primary articles
fields.tooltip: Number of rows(type from 1 to 8) and columns(type from 1 to 4) for primary articles.

fields.name: secondary_row_column
fields.label: Rows/Columns of secondary articles
fields.tooltip: Number of rows(type from 1 to 8) and columns(type from 1 to 4) for secondary articles.

fields.name: other_cols
fields.label: Columns for other archive views
fields.tooltip: Specify amount of columns for tag, author, latest post page.
